path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Verichains_Lab/Verichains Public Audit Report - Naga Token and Vesting - v1.2.pdf

findings.title: Missing check the received users in _computeReleasableAmount function
findings.description: The _computeReleasableAmount function does not check whether the user has claimed tokens or not during cliff time and first duration, allowing users to receive tokens multiple times with an amount larger than the vestingAmount value.

findings.title: Unnecessary usage of SafeMath library in Solidity 0.8.0+
findings.description: The SafeMath library is unnecessarily used in the contract for overflow checking, which is already handled by default in Solidity 0.8.0+. It's recommended to use normal arithmetic operators for readability and gas saving.
